Not that you think about her mind that she is trying to fill with an education. Your only interest in her mind, along with the rest of her body, is what she will taste like.

So once in position you grasp her shirt collar in your front claws while you stretch out so that your hind legs rest on her shirt covered belly. You are hoping that this variation will let you escape getting bounced of the wall when you strike, but experience tells you not to be too optimistic.

Such thoughts are well founded as when you sink your teeth into her throat, capturing her pulse as the first jet of her hot blood fills your mouth. Your front paws clutch her tight, claws sinking into the starched collar of her uniform that is even low being soaked in crimson life-blood.

In the moment it take the girl to realise something is wrong your rear legs kick and claw at her belly, shredding her shirt and the flesh beneath until your as paddling in rendered intestines. In shock the girl tries to stand, distracted from the lethal bite at her throat by the agony of being disembowelled. But once more your fears proved well founder as in her panic she grabs the scruff of your neck and hurls you towards the open window.

It was pure luck that left you entangled in the blinds rather that departing the dormitory through the third floor window. You were really getting to hate this prey as each time she is reformed she manages to retain her instinctive defence.

When you finally untangle yourself the girl is almost motionless, laying face down in her blood drenched homework. Almost being the operative word as you are no longer alone.

That is another problem with hunting in the dormitories. You rarely get to eat without being interrupted.
1252123112.title: Soft and delicious throats

choices: Alpha Morph - a chameleon who loves to wear other students.
Theta Morph - who loves absorbing by surprise
133.content:
Alpha and Theta Morph may be products of a scientific experiments although there are rumours they could be remnants of a captive alien.

No one at the Academy knows for sure and given their nature they have very few fixed memories of their own.

So whether they were once part of a single creature is a matter for historians. What is important now is that they both go to the Academy and despite some friendly rivalry they get on well.

Alpha Morph.
In it's natural state it might be a translucent blob, but no one (including itself) can remember when it was last like that.

Alpha is a chameleon predator who loves to take on the form of those it absorbs, having temporary possession of their memories as it tries to hide in plain sight. Because of the bits of experience it retains from each victim Alpha knows far more about what goes on at the Academy than many realise.

Theta Morph.
Theta doesn't like the solids at all. Although there is pleasure to be taken in absorbing fellow students for theta it is the joy of outsmarting the solids that counts.

Theta will take on the appearance of the objects around the Academy, whether a chair, book or sometimes even clothing. Then it waits for a victim to come by and absorbs them.

Other choice?
There are many genderless slimes you could choose, so if the Morphs are not to your taste then you can tell us about a different slime.
133.title: Genderless

choices: A quiet time in the library?
1332.content:
Theta Morph

You are one of the unrecognised students at the academy. You attend all your classes, do all the work required but because of your nature you are very rarely noticed.

You could be at the front of a class listening carefully to everything the teachers says and most students would be unaware. But you always got the top grades.

But then you have the advantage of being able to consume the teacher at the end of the class, learning their lesson by absorbing their brains.

But when you are not disguised as chalk boards or desks to capture your teachers you can be found around the academy, hunting your fellow students.
1332.title: Theta Morph - who loves absorbing by surprise

choices: Move through the pipework to class?
13321.content:
The water feature in the courtyard was one of your favourite hunting areas. There was the fountain itself surrounded by the stone benches. Then there was a network of pipes that kept various other channels and pools filled.

On a hot day it was a popular place to relax and for an amorphous slime all the water made moving around discretely very easy.

You had been looking for an easy meal when you found a posse of girls on the benches by the fountain. You knew these girls well having taken all of them at one time or another.

In fact it was a bit of a game you played with yourself, seeing how often you could surprise them as they always believed that they would outsmart you the next time. But all you had to do was wait until they dropped their guard again.

At the centre of the group were the two sisters Cheryl and Cathy. There were other girls as well but you enjoyed taking the centre of attention if you could. So while Cheryl was expounding her latest theory on boy-band hotness you made your play for Cathy.

The bench she sat on was slightly damp from the fountain's spray which made it easy for you to reach the girl. Sending a thin film trough the water you made contact with her, slipping in and transforming flesh as you went.

First order of business was taking control of her nervous system and once that was done you had her trapped.

Cheryl was still talking, going on and on about the latest gossip. But you largely ignored her as you explored her sister. Cathy had stopped trembling now as her body seemed to accept the inevitable.

You followed the smooth curves of her body, spreading up her back, forming a thin, film like layer. At every point of contact you slipped inside. The pores of her young skin providing countless channels into her flesh.

None of the other girls seemed to notice as your conquest was completed. Although Cathy looked barely changed, you had her from the tips of her pink painted toe nails to the roots of her hair. Even her eyes were yours, forcing her to see the world through a thin film of your substance. With the girl captured you continued to flow. Taking the young girl from beneath you quickly filled her belly, transforming her flesh as you went.

Following the paths of her optic nerves you quickly absorbed the girl's brains. Although you could have explored her mind. You could have noted her dreams, her ambitions or even her hopes for the future. But you didn't. Like countless creatures before her, she was just nourishment. As such her mind was processed like the other fats and muscles that made up her teenage body.

You had almost completed Cathy's conversion when Cheryl finally noticed that her sister hadn't spoken for some minutes.

“Cathy, are you OK?” The thin layer of skin that was all that remained of your meal didn't respond to her sister. Instead you withdrew. As your bulk returned Cathy's shell deflated, collapsing in on itself. In a few seconds even the shell was erased as your returning slime absorbed the final remains of the girl, even sucking her blonde hair into your bulk where it was converted to more slime. Then it was finished. All that remained of Cathy was her empty clothes.

Satisfied you leave the stunned Cheryl staring at where her sister had been consumed.

Buzzing with the energy from your meal you have the rest of your day to plan.
13321.title: Cathy taken in the courtyard?

choices: You're looking for a little lunch

Your human body is muscular and toned with well kept, long hair while your powerful blue snake coils reach upwards of forty meters. As your snake body is four feet wide, you've never found a maximum capacity for your belly. For some reason, your prey doesn't seem to reform like it should in the machines. In fact, it rarely does.
141.title: Alex

1411.content:
Your belly is rumbling for food, it was time to feed.

However, the question was what, or more exactly who, was on the menu today

Looking at a nearby schedule, you found when classes were ending in a few minutes, the best time to hunt.

Now begged the question, were you in the mood for a snack, a meal, or a buffet?
1411.title: You're looking for a little lunch

14111.content:
Eh, you werent too hungry, just a quick snack should tide you over. With that in mind, you slink over to to the elementary section of the school.

Upon arriving, you see two different classes, a preschool class that was currently having nap time and a second year class that was having indoor recess.

On one hand, there was easy pickings waiting to be devoured, but on the other, you have always enjoyed a good hunt.
14111.title: Snack

14132.title: Fantasy

info.brief_description: A Story of a school that contains a little bit of everything (vore related)
info.description:
In this world there are all different types of creatures inhabiting it. The All Academy is a school in which all the intelligent creatures of the world can be schooled, from K- college. Although this school has strict rules to follow, there is little to none about sex or dating. But a recent problem has risen up called "vore" and its many counterparts. To stop this while giving the students (and teachers at times) freedom, they installed machines to "reform" those who have been eaten or etc. back into their dorm rooms. But the students have also figures out how to mess with the machines to make whoever reforms a different gender, race, or change parts of their bodies.

The major creatures that goes to All Academy are:

Humans: Nothing special about them, just normal humans.

Dogs/Cats: Similar looking to humans only stronger/flexible and have dog/cat ears and tails. They can also be humanoid cats or dogs if you want.

Slimes: Creatures made of slime, can absorb just about anything and can slip into any
cracks. Can also reshape their bodies.

Nagas: Half human half snake. Very stealthy and fast.

Note:
Please be literate. ABSOLUTELY NO "TEXT TALK"!
No herms, keep guys guys and girls girls....well you can change there gender while they reform.
Other than that have fun!
